WHY ADAS DEPOT SYSTEMS WORK

With so many systems available, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed. That’s why we help you choose the right tool for your workflow, space, and business size.

We set clients up with a complete training program to ensure success from day one. We provide launch and ongoing technical support — you're never left on your own

WHO THESE SYSTEMS ARE BUILT FOR

See how ADAS Depot solutions empower various automotive businesses to excel in ADAS calibration — from mobile services to high-volume shops
01

IA900

CALIBRATION AND WHEEL ALIGNMENT
ALL-SYSTEMS PACKAGE FOR HIGH-VOLUME SERVICE CENTERS
Used by: Large independent repair shops & dealerships
A game changing two in one, you can handle both ADAS calibrations and Wheel Alignments with a single frame. Designed for efficiency, the IA900 helps high-volume service centers handle 30+ ADAS calibrations monthly. With precise optical positioning and an integrated alignment pre-check, it drastically reduces setup time and boosts throughput
SEE IF IA900 FITS YOUR SERVICE CENTER

IA900

02

IA700

NEXT GENERATION MODULAR, PORTABLE,
AND PRECISE MID-RANGE PACKAGE FOR GROWING WORKSHOPS
IA700’s smart workflow and integrated pre-alignment check make it the ideal solution for shops needing a compact camera-based system that can break down into five pieces. It’s user-friendly and compact, enabling precise confident calibrations, and at the same time, versatile enough to bring to another shop without requiring a full dedicated bay or expert-level experience.
SEE IF IA900 FITS YOUR SERVICE CENTER

IA700

03

MA600

MOBILE KIT FOR ON-SITE & COMPACT OPERATIONS
The portable MA600 allows technicians to deliver accurate ADAS calibrations on-site — ideal for mobile use or small workshops without dedicated space. Its modular design ensures flexibility in tight or non-traditional setups.
SEE IF IA900 FITS YOUR SERVICE CENTER

MA600

  4. 04 Resources and updates to stay compliant with new models
